column4: does anyone happen to know how to compile byobu (the old screen-profiles)? there is no configure file
I know, but I want the newest from their own repo because a bug I filed was fixed
byobu is (on my system) just a /usr/bin/byobu: POSIX shell script text executable
maybe, but what will happen if the torrents create dirs there?
I rather think it's not possible to own stuff as user in a root group
I assumed the folder was empty right now
you said: "find out what process is behind it..." -- how can you do that?
something like ps -ef | grep update/apt/notifier whatever, or maybe xprop knows something
I have e17, it has an option to see what process is behind the window, very convenient
enlightenment, you know, the awesome window manager that has released alpha after ten years
thx for the hint about xprop - just what I asked for :-)
